::Dark Lavacons::

       The Dark Lavacons keep rampaging around, destroyi=
ng everything.  But, this Oblitertron.......The name........Oblitertron....=
....It had the Dark Lavacon feel in it.........Destruction.....Obliteration=
..........Hmm.

         The Dark Lavacons suddenly all had an idea.  They =
weren't completely mindless, they could still think somewhat.......Yes, the=
 Dark Lavacons and these dudes were somewhat alike.....Yes, that was it!!!!=


          All the Dark Lavacons made a circle together, and then, dark fi=
re started coming.  A little stream of dark lava appeared.  Suddenly, they =
all started floating up and weird stuff.

         Fenox flew up, and press=
ed a button on his shoulder.  Then, what looked like a head appeared.  And =
a......A body too, chest and stomach, with Fenox inside!!!!

       Then, A=
stral flew up, and was in the head.  

      Starlight and Recklessa came u=
p, and they each pressed the button on their shoulders.  Yes.....It was mak=
ing sence now.  Starlight was in an arm, which attached on to the right of =
the body, and Recklessa in an arm which went on to the left.

       Gripla=
sh finally came up, and was in the lower part of the body, he pressed a but=
ton on his shoulder, and two legs formed.  And their, stood a gestalt.....A=
 giant robot.........Dark Lavatron.

        Dark Lavatron grinned, and lau=
ghed evilly.

        Astral, in the head, spoke, with a dark, evil voice.
=

        "Alliance!!!!!  Let us come together, and make an ultimate Allianc=
e!!!!!  We can destroy vast galaxies!!!!!  Think about it!!!!!  Destruction=
 reigning everywhere!!!!!  Do you wish to join, and become one, or do you w=
ish to die??"
